wired.title: A Chinese Logo Cleverly Designed for Hyper Growth in the Next 30 Years
wired.topComment: Looks more like a paid PR piece. In that case it's misleading to not indicate that this was paid for. This was cross posted on slate.com too.

wired.title: Why We Should Design Some Things to Be Difficult to Use
wired.topComment: Oh now I get it. That is why the print version of Wired is done with tiny type and awful colors. It makes us better magazine readers.
